attributes.action: Close the Border to Prevent/Slow further Spread of the Coronavirus (Covid-19)
attributes.additional_details:
Countries like Russia and Singapore, who closed their Borders to new arrivals as soon as the outbreak started, have managed to stop (or at least rapidly slow down) the spread of Covid-19 in their Countries.
Meanwhile other countries like the US, Denmark, Mexico, and several others, are following suite.
The evidence is clear then that Tight Border Controls, and the screenings of New Arrivals, are the way forward if we want to prevent a catastrophe in this Country.
Time is short, we must act now!
attributes.background:
The Coronavirus Pandemic is probably one of the biggest public health Crises that the UK has faced for Generations, and is spreading like wildfire across Europe.
This Government should, in response, close our Borders to new arrivals from Europe and countries most affected, to help slow the spread.
